alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BAND OF HEAVY SNOW OVER PORTIONS OF IRON RANGE TO TWIN PORTS AND I-35 CORRIDOR THROUGH 7 PM... At 5 PM a band of heavy snow stretched from Embarrass to Cotton to Cloquet to Hinckley and was moving southwest at 20 mph. Locations affected by this band of snow through 7 PM include Virginia, Cotton, Hibbing, Floodwood, Twig, Cloquet, McGregor, Moose Lake, Hinckley, and Pine City. Expect visibility as low as 1/2 mile at times in heavy snow. Rapid snow accumulation of 1/2 inch to an 1 1/2 inches is possible in the band. This could lead to temporary whiteout conditions and the potential for dangerous driving conditions. If you are traveling and encounter adverse winter driving conditions, reduce speed and make sure headlights are on.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin
